successes.title: The Peloton Bike: Bring Home the Studio Cycling Experience
successes.description: The Peloton Bike delivers live and on-demand indoor cycling classes to your home, while allowing competition & video chat with friends

Pledges.description: Reserve your USERNAME on Peloton to be seen on the leaderboard by Peloton riders around the world.
Receive a Limited Edition Peloton WATER BOTTLE and reserve your USERNAME on Peloton to be seen on the leaderboard by Peloton riders around the world.
A gorgeous Peloton Long-Sleeve T-SHIRT (and the water bottle and username)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: The Peloton Bike 
(Shipping paid separately. USA ONLY)

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: The Peloton Bike
(Shipping paid separately. USA ONLY)
INTERNATIONAL PACKAGE: The Peloton Bike equipped for Canadian, European or Asian product standards. (Shipping paid separately. Non-USA Countries)

FULLY LOADED PACKAGE: The Peloton Bike plus Peloton headphones, Peloton biking shoes, a Peloton heart rate monitor, the Peloton hand weights, a Peloton shirt, and a Peloton sweat mat (you're going to need it!)
(Shipping paid separately. USA ONLY)

THE PELOTON EXPERIENCE: The Peloton Bike (and all of the accessories) AND a trip for two to NYC to meet the team and teach (or take) your very own class in the Peloton Studio, to be accessible to all Peloton riders via on-demand classes! (USA ONLY)
